text: Punyam is a 2002 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by Rajesh Narayanan and produced by Nizar Abdul Rahim, starring Boban Alummoodan and Lakshmi Gopalaswamy in the lead roles. http://spicyonion.com/title/punyam-malayalam- movie/ ==Cast== * Krishna Kumar (KK) * Boban Alummoodan * Lakshmi Gopalaswamy * Sindhu * Captain Raju * Narendra Prasad * Risabava * Salim Kumar * Urmila Unni ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Punyam
